title: Overriding html in 2 webpack project
body:
(My english is bad) I have a question about html overriding... I've 2 project : one with core, one with specific template. I am in the project with specific template, but I want to serve html files from this specific, and if the html doesn't exist, I would take the html from core... How can I do that ? Thank's you !

I've search a lot on internet but nothing..
